title: Chapter 726 - Too Weak
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 726 - Too Weak

As his head flew through the air, astonishment and bewilderment were written all over Ye Changchun’s face.

It seemed he would never have guessed he’d die so quickly…

Thus!

Both head and headless body fell into the lake, creating a ring of red.

The entire area was deathly silent.

When Su Yi swung Abstruse Celestial, he cleaved through the lightning filling the sky, destroyed the Blue Lightning Daoist Seal, and slew Ye Changchun!

And he did it all practically in a single breath, so quick that it was almost unbelievable.

It was to the point that when Ye Changchun’s head flew through the air, the crowd almost didn’t get time to react.

This scene was truly unexpected.

When Ye Changchun called upon the full power of his Natal Spirit Treasure, its power and momentum shook heaven and earth. Everyone present broke out in cold sweats on Su Yi’s behalf.

Many of them even wondered if Su Yi would be in danger.

Who’d have thought that Su Yi would cut Ye Changchun down just as he revealed the pinnacle of his strength?

“He’s dead!?” someone couldn’t help but blurt. It seemed they couldn’t...
